PTAGIS Interagation sites configuration

Source: R/queryInterrogrationConfig.R
queryInterrogationConfig.Rd

Query and download configuration metadata for PTAGIS Interrogation sites

queryInterrogationConfig(site = NULL)

Arguments

site

PTAGIS site code. Default is NULL which will query all sites

Source

http://www.ptagis.org

Author

Kevin See

Examples

queryInterrogationConfig(site = "ZEN")

#> # A tibble: 19 x 7
#>    siteCode siteName            configurationSeque… antennaGroupName   antennaID
#>    <chr>    <chr>                             <int> <chr>              <chr>    
#>  1 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A1       
#>  2 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A2       
#>  3 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A3       
#>  4 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A4       
#>  5 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B1       
#>  6 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B2       
#>  7 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B3       
#>  8 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B4       
#>  9 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 100 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B5       
#> 10 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A1       
#> 11 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A2       
#> 12 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A3       
#> 13 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 UPPER IN-STREAM A… A4       
#> 14 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B1       
#> 15 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B2       
#> 16 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B3       
#> 17 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B4       
#> 18 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B5       
#> 19 ZEN      Secesh River at Ze…                 110 LOWER IN-STREAM A… B6       
#> # … with 2 more variables: startDate <dttm>, endDate <dttm>
